spec_data.Name: perl-Module-Install-Copyright
spec_data.License: (GPL+ or Artistic) and CC-BY-SA and Public Domain
spec_data.Description:
This Module::Install plug-in extracts copyright and licensing information from
embedded POD and/or RDF meta-data included in the distribution, and outputs it
as a text file called COPYRIGHT which should roughly conform to the Debian
copyright file format.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 01:31:42 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Package a COPYRIGHT file with a distribution
